Articles.Content: A simple request that would add a bit of life to space stations and bases. The windows of hitchhiker containers would light up if they were populated seeing as they are lit up in IVAs. FusTek Station Parts already does that so it should be quite easy too.
Support. It's minor and some mods alterady do that with their own parts.
I always thought it would be neat if you could see in through the windows, instead of the opaque blue it currently is.

Seeing through would require several parts instead of one, so that's not a great idea.

Glowing windows, that would be cool.
